duties_responsibilities.duty: Build a book of residual income by driving business-to-business sales and maintaining client relationships.
Initiate and prioritize opportunities, and manage multiple touch points to drive outcomes and revenues.
Engage in critical business discussions with business owners to solve their product and service promotion and sales challenges.
Utilize a custom CRM platform for client acquisition and maintenance.
Generate compelling and persuasive communication to bring concepts to life and drive revenue growth.
